description: A Switch or Checkbox component used to indicate an on/off state. This is equivalent to a checkbox. The switch supports both Switch and Checkbox styles which can be used in different scenarios.

props.name: label
props.description: The switch label, the label can be optional only in the case the switch is part of a more complex component.

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: The indeterminate state of the checkbox.

props.name: switchStyle
props.description: Style the switch as a Switch or a Checkbox.

events.name: indeterminate-change
events.description: Emitted when an indeterminate checkbox is toggled to checked.

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted when the switch is toggled checked or unchecked.
